description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSDX, VSTX, VSSX, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX,VSDX,VSSX,VSTX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
   
   New Features   
   DIAGRAMNET-50210-Save only the area of visible shapes not the whole page
   DIAGRAMNET-50262-Export only selective Visio shapes to the SVG format   
     
    Bugs  
   DIAGRAMNET-50195-VSD to PDF conversion, incorrect date format in the title shape
   DIAGRAMNET-50779-The background color of the tables is black on saving VSDX to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-50797-The transparent background of images turns into white color on converting VSD to PNG
   DIAGRAMNET-51019-The color of shapes is not being preserved on converting a VSDX to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51023-The formatting of rectangle shape is missing on converting a VSDX to PNG
   DIAGRAMNET-51024-The shadow of shapes is not being rendered properly on converting a VSD to SVG
   DIAGRAMNET-51029-The color of callouts and text is not being preserved on converting a VSDX to PNG
   DIAGRAMNET-51031-A Microsoft Sharepoint Workflow shape is missing on converting a VSDX to PNG
   DIAGRAMNET-51032-Missing text items on converting a VSDX to PNG
   DIAGRAMNET-51045-Can't retrieve the fill color of rectangle shape from a VSDX diagram
   DIAGRAMNET-51055-Incomplete rendering of the dynamic connectors on converting a VSD to HTML
   DIAGRAMNET-51119-The rounded rectangle shapes are changed on converting a VSDX to PNG
   DIAGRAMNET-51121-The text items are displaced on converting a VSD to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51124-The functions of the cross-functional flowchart are missing on loading and saving a VSDX
   DIAGRAMNET-51130-Set custom property does not work
   DIAGRAMNET-51134-Duplicate hyperlinks are being added on converting a VSD to PDF
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
